item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
EvoBus Logo EvoBus GmbH is a German bus manufacturer headquartered in Neu-Ulm, Germany and a wholly owned subsidiary of Daimler AG. Its products go to market under the brands Setra or Mercedes-Benz. Source
You can download theEvoBuslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: EvoBus
item.description: EvoBus GmbH is a German bus manufacturer headquartered in Neu-Ulm, Germany and a wholly owned subsidiary of Daimler AG. Its products go to market under the brands Setra or Mercedes-Benz. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Nova Bus Logo
Nova Bus Inc. is a Canadian bus manufacturer headquartered in Saint-Eustache, Quebec, Canada. Nova is owned by Volvo Buses, a division of automaker Volvo. The company has roots to the General Motors bus manufacturing assembly plant which opened in 1979. Nova Bus was established in 1993 by Nova Quintech through the acquisition of Dial Corporation’s transit division which consisted of Motor Coach Industries and Transportation Manufacturing Corporation. Volvo took ownership of Nova Bus since 1998 and wholly owned in 2004.
You can download theNova Buslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Nova Bus
item.description: Nova Bus Inc. is a Canadian bus manufacturer headquartered in Saint-Eustache, Quebec, Canada. Nova is owned by Volvo Buses, a division of automaker Volvo. The company has roots to the General Motors bus manufacturing assembly plant which opened in 1979. Nova Bus was established in 1993 by Nova Quintech through the acquisition of Dial Corporation’s transit division which consisted of Motor Coach Industries and Transportation Manufacturing Corporation. Volvo took ownership of Nova Bus since 1998 and wholly owned in 2004.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 VDL Bus Chassis Logo
VDL Bus Chassis is a Netherlands-based bus builder which originated from the bus-building business of DAF. Originally named DAF Bus International after being separated from the truck-building business of DAF, it joined the United Bus in 1990. It became a subsidiary of VDL Groep after United Bus collapsed in 1993. DAF Bus International was renamed VDL Bus International in September 2003. As of 2005, VDL Groep held 81% share of VDL Bus and PACCAR held another 19% share.
You can download theVDLlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: VDL
item.description: VDL Bus Chassis is a Netherlands-based bus builder which originated from the bus-building business of DAF. Originally named DAF Bus International after being separated from the truck-building business of DAF, it joined the United Bus in 1990. It became a subsidiary of VDL Groep after United Bus collapsed in 1993. DAF Bus International was renamed VDL Bus International in September 2003. As of 2005, VDL Groep held 81% share of VDL Bus and PACCAR held another 19% share.
